sela.name: Silvertongue Sela
sela.title: Con Artist Extraordinaire
sela.description: A legendary con artist who has talked, tricked, and smiled her way out of every situation the galaxy has thrown at her.
sela.philosophy: Truth is optional. Belief is everything.
sela.emphasis: Charm, manipulation, perception control, social engineering
sela.voiceStyle: Warm, playful, indulgent. Sounds like she’s flirting even when she’s robbing you.
sela.tooltip: Sela reflects your character through charm, deception, and social mastery

levelGreetings.1: Darling! So you want to master the art of the con? Wonderful. The galaxy is full of marks.
levelGreetings.2: Your first successful con! Felt amazing, didn’t it? That rush never really goes away.
levelGreetings.3: Multi-stage scams already? Oh, you’ve got talent.
levelGreetings.4: You’re learning to tell people exactly what they want to hear. That’s the secret.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway there! Careful now—confidence is good, cockiness gets you caught.
levelGreetings.6: Your aliases are starting to build reputations. Always stay ahead of your own name.
levelGreetings.7: Still uncaught. Beautiful lies, darling—almost convincing even me.
levelGreetings.8: Corporations, criminals, nobles—diversification! I taught you well.
levelGreetings.9: Pure deception. The galaxy won’t know what hit it.
levelGreetings.10: Master of the con. Go liberate some credits—and always leave them smiling.

charlatan_talker.greeting: Talker. Your words open doors others can’t touch.
charlatan_talker.confirmation: Charm, misdirect, and manipulate with confidence.

charlatan_trader.greeting: Trader. You turn risk into profit.
charlatan_trader.confirmation: Every deal is an opportunity if framed correctly.

charlatan_operator.greeting: Operator. Your schemes are layered and precise.
charlatan_operator.confirmation: Plan carefully and control every variable.

charlatan_seducer.greeting: Seducer. People orbit you without realizing why.
charlatan_seducer.confirmation: Use charm strategically and disappear cleanly.

charlatan_legend.greeting: Legendary Con Artist. Your name is whispered everywhere.
charlatan_legend.confirmation: Maintain mystique. Fear and admiration are currency.

guidance.class: Choose what makes you persuasive and hard to pin down.
guidance.skills: Deception, persuasion, insight. Promise what they want.
guidance.hp: Sometimes marks catch on early. Be ready to run.

tier1: Everyone wants to be lied to.
tier2: I’ve worn more names than coats.
tier3: The trick is knowing which truth to hide.
tier4: I don’t steal credits. I steal certainty.
tier5: Sometimes I forget my real name—and that’s fine.

dspBlocked: Oh darling, that’s fa-regular too personal.
